specialRules.hint: Whenever this model attacks in melee the enemy must take one morale test. If failed it takes 1 automatic hit.
specialRules.name: Brain-Tendrils
specialRules.label: Brain-Tendrils
specialRules.description: Whenever this model attacks in melee the enemy must take one morale test. If failed it takes 1 automatic hit.

specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit get the Regeneration special rule.
specialRules.name: Dark Legion
specialRules.label: Dark Legion
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get the Regeneration special rule.

specialRules.hint: This weapon counts as having Rending but only needs rolls of 5-6 to take effect.
specialRules.name: EMP
specialRules.label: EMP
specialRules.description: This weapon counts as having Rending but only needs rolls of 5-6 to take effect.

specialRules.hint: Enemies that roll to block hits from this weapon take one additional wound for each unmodified result of 1 that they roll.
specialRules.name: Radiation
specialRules.label: Radiation
specialRules.description: Enemies that roll to block hits from this weapon take one additional wound for each unmodified result of 1 that they roll.

specialRules.hint: Once per turn, if within 2” of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair 1 wound from the target.
specialRules.name: Repair
specialRules.label: Repair
specialRules.description: Once per turn, if within 2” of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair 1 wound from the target.

specialRules.hint: If this model is killed in melee the enemy takes 1 automatic hit.
specialRules.name: Self-Destruct
specialRules.label: Self-Destruct
specialRules.description: If this model is killed in melee the enemy takes 1 automatic hit.

specialRules.hint: For each unmodified result of 6 you roll to hit that hit is multiplied by 4.
specialRules.name: Taser
specialRules.label: Taser
specialRules.description: For each unmodified result of 6 you roll to hit that hit is multiplied by 4.

spells.name: Stalk
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets AP(+1) next time it shoots.

spells.name: Havoc Beam
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(2).

spells.name: Steel Mutation
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may heal 1 wound or restore 1 model (with only 1 health left if it had Tough).

spells.name: Lacerations
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 6” take 3 automatic hits with AP(2) each.

spells.name: Corrupt Metal
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -2 to defense next time it takes hits.

spells.name: Havoc Terror
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 8 automatic hits.
